location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Stephen Babbington, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the commands of the Bombay Government dated 28 October 1811, which instructed the Resident about the pension payments he is to make to Mahomed H Khaun and Mioza Mahomed Jurene, sons of the late Mahome Aly Khaun.
